description: Explore the great outdoors in style with the Papluma insulated vest. Made from RDS-certified environmentally-friendly down, it allows for layering without adding weight. Its stand-up collar adds a stylish touch while protecting you from the cold winter wind. Crafted in nylon with a waxed finish for wind resistance and equipped with a durable water-repellent (DWR) treatment for rain protection, this vest keeps you dry even in inclement weather. With its chic, feminine cut, the Papluma vest combines style and functionality, allowing you to enjoy the winter season fully.
name: Papluma II Vest - Womens

specs.value: Eco-responsible RDS-certified white duck down, 80% down, 20% feather, swelling index 700 in³
